question: what deeds and prayers should be made in order to find out the kind of life partner that one likes. what islamic ways r there for hurdles made by the others through magic,jealousy, etc.
answer:
QUESTION
i want to know what deeds and prayers should be made in order to find out the kind of life partner that one likes.what islamic ways r there for hurdles made by the others through magic,jealousy etc in teh way of getting married what is the meaning of name haris??i want to know what deeds and prayers should be made in order to find out the kind of life partner that one likes.what islamic ways r there for hurdles made by the others through magic,jealousy etc in teh way of getting married
ANSWER


Share:
1. You don't need a Du'aa to determine what you like. You very well know
what you like. So, your question seems vague. Look for a woman who you feel
inclined to but give preference to piety over all other factors.
2. Haarith means, 'one who tills the land'. The name signifies a person who
tills the land of this world and hopes to reap the fruit (reward) of the
hereafter. It is a good name.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Muhammad Kadwa
